cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A concise cheatsheet for Flask, a lightweight WSGI web application framework for Python.

cards.title: Install Flask
cards.code: pip install flask

cards.title: Hello World
Flask CLI
cards.code:
export FLASK_APP=app.py
flask run

cards.title: App Object
cards.code:
from flask import Flask
app = Flask(__name__)

cards.title: Configuration
cards.code:
app.config["DEBUG"] = True
app.config.from_pyfile("config.py")

cards.title: Common Config Keys
cards.body:
| Key | Description |
| | -- |
| `DEBUG` | Enable debug mode |
| `SECRET_KEY` | For sessions/cookies |
| `ENV` | Set to 'development' |
